sentence.Network_en: Postmodernist novel Snow White is Donald Barthelme s representative work.
sentence.Network_cn: 《白雪公主》是唐纳德·巴塞尔姆的代表作.

sentence.Network_en: According to this postmodernist interpretation, the principle of reason is not bankrupt.
sentence.Network_cn: 基于对后现代主义的这一解读, 现代性的理性原则并未破产.

sentence.Network_en: Technology, as a critical issue and fundamental phenomenon, calls attention of postmodernist philosophy.
sentence.Network_cn: 技术作为我们时代的突出主题和根本现象成为后现代主义哲学反思和批判的对象.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 14 关于后现代主义者（postmodernist）的论述，下列叙述何者错误？ (A)后现代主义者相信主观的现实（subjective reality） (B)后现 …
the postmodernist characteristics of cognitive linguistics ., 认知语言学的后现代主义特征.
政治就如同一幕幕罗生门般的戏码，正如后现代主义论者（postmodernist）所谓之「超真实」（hyperreality）（Baudrillard, 1983: 23…
后现代观点(Postmodernist) 认为人类都存活语言的世界(或空间) 就好像鱼存活在水的空间中，我们都容易忘记了这个语言的空间怎样 …

list.abs: american postmodernistic poetry and classical chinese poetry ., 美国后现代诗歌与中国古诗.
an analysis of the postmodernist narrative characteristics in sula ., < 秀拉 > 的后现代叙事特征探析.
the postmodernist characteristics of cognitive linguistics ., 认知语言学的后现代主义特征.
...定观、理性主义、物质主义、顺从、权威崇拜等。相反，如果个体成长期处于安全的社会经济环境中，就会形成“后现代主义的价值观”(postmodernist value)，如平均主义、个体主义、人际信任、容忍多元化、自我超越等。有研究者认为，在这种环境中，人们就会把享受.

entry.def: A post-modernist is a writer, artist, or architect who is influenced by post-modernism.

example.ex: Postmodernists say there is no objective truth. Why should anyone believe them?
example.tran: 后现代主义者声称不存在客观事实。人们凭什么要相信他们呢？

auth_sentence.content: The postmodernist heyday was long past; minimalism was in decline.
auth_sentence.res_content: The postmodernist heyday was long past; minimalism was in decline.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The postmodernist heyday was long past; minimalism was in decline.

auth_sentence.content: Time-travelled to recent years, van Meegeren would have made an upstanding postmodernist.
auth_sentence.res_content: Time-travelled to recent years, van Meegeren would have made an upstanding postmodernist.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Time-travelled to recent years, van Meegeren would have made an upstanding postmodernist.
